message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AR, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a methodology for improving the performance of deep learning systems through hardware-software co-design, specifically by extending neural architecture search to consider hardware efficiency. This topic is highly relevant to the field of machine learning (cs.LG) and also touches on areas such as computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and systems and control (cs.SY). Additionally, the use of hardware information suggests a potential overlap with the field of computer architecture (cs.AR).
